Method.name: OnPageHEAD
Method.Implementation: Write "<HEAD>" Write !,"<title>"_($G(%session.Data("systemname")))_"</title>",! Write "<link href=""style.css"" type=text/css rel=stylesheet>" Write !,"<script language=""Jscript"" src=""common.js"">" Write "</script>" Write !,"<STYLE>" Write !,"@media all{",! Write " IE\:Calendar{",! Write " behavior: url(htc/calendar.htc) ;",! Write " width : 33%;",! Write " }}",! Write "</STYLE>" Write !,"<script language=""Jscript"">" Write !,"function startFun(){",! Write "window.returnValue=cal.value;",! Write "window.close();",! Write "}",! Write "</script>" Write !,"</HEAD>"

Method.name: OnPageHTML
Method.Implementation: Write "<HTML XMLNS:IE>" Write ! Do ..OnPageHEAD() Write ! Do ..OnPageBODY() Write !,"</HTML>"
